A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Beautiful visuals and a fun ride with a talented cast. The story on the other hand jumped around\, and some of the more interesting characters were surprisingly cut off. Quite drastic and uninteresting compared to Edwards and Abrams story of Star Wars. Why go for humor similar to that of Marvel? This is Star Wars and deserves much more character development and background. What is Star Wars without a decent light saber duel?
